title: ðŸš€ Building in Public: AI Chatbot Update! ðŸ¤–ðŸ’¬
description:
Well it's time for an update! We talk a lot here about building in public and letting people see the process and the big build for me is a help AI chatbot which hasn't always worked the way I've wanted it, so let's see what's been happening?

Lets jump into it!

Check out our new tech moves with: https://internetfactory.substack.com/

Join the conversation and share your thoughts in the comments below.
_____________ 

Don't forget to like, comment & subscribe for so you don't miss out!

#chatbot #technology #update #ai
